author: Special Correspondent
text:
A rat snake found in the bathroom of Minister for Food and Civil Supplies and Consumer Affairs Dinesh Gundu Rao’s house was the source of panic at his residence in MLA layout, R.T. Nagar, on Wednesday.

A family member alerted the BBMP. Volunteers later arrived on the scene and rescued the snake.

Last year, the BBMP had rescued four snakes from the house, said a volunteer, adding that the latest visitor would be released into Bannerghatta National Park.
title: Snake rescued from Minister’s house
